title: Introducing Call of Duty: Mobile Season 6 — Gundams Arrive
description: The post Introducing Call of Duty: Mobile Season 6 — Gundams Arrive appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Joe Skrebels, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief
byline: June 25, 2025 by Call of Duty Staff
excerpt: Get interstellar and launch into battle as Gundam descends on Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 6 — Gundams Arrive. This major collaboration with the legendary Japanese franchise gives you a chance to engage with and earn Gundam themed operators, weapons, and rewards through many parts of the new season.
text: Gundams Arrive Get interstellar and launch into battle as Gundam descends on Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 6 — Gundams Arrive. This major collaboration with the legendary Japanese franchise gives you a chance to engage with and earn Gundam themed operators, weapons, and rewards through many parts of the new season.  Get ready to duel it out with your own Gundam themed mech in the 4v4 Gundam Team Deathmatch, earn free rewards in the Gundam in-game event, and then unlock Gundam-themed Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, and more through two Series Armories store offers. Beyond Gundam, the Season 6 Battle Pass adds sci-fi themed Operators, Weapon Blueprints, and more, all ready to stand toe to toe with enemy Operators, whether they’re fighting with boots on the ground or suiting up for mech combat. This exciting content will launch alongside a Double CP event that will last for the entire season.   Season 6 — Gundams Arrive goes live beginning July 2nd at 5 PM PT. Multiplayer: Gundam Team Deathmatch Combat Systems Engaged  As part of the collaboration with Gundam, we’re excited to announce this epic new limited-time Multiplayer mode where players get to jump into in Call of Duty: Mobile operators themed around Gundams, including icons like Ethan — Freedom Gundam, Reaper — Sazabi Gundam, Proton — v Gundamo, and Deathscythe Gundam (EW).  This 4v4 mode is based around classic mech vs mech Gundam duels, where the battles are smaller and designed for fluid and versatile combat. Dodge, sprint, and activate your vertical jets to get up high using the suit’s mechanized mobility features. Instead of your normal Loadout weapons, each Gundam comes with its own special abilities and weapons.  Gundam Team Deathmatch battles are fought from a third-person perspective on a new map made specifically for the mode, taking place on an interstellar space station with multiple futuristic points of interest. Keep an eye out for themed events and easy ways to snag new rewards while playing this mode.  Bonus Gundam Animations: After completing a game of Gundam Team Deathmatch, players can watch Gundam themed operator animations outside the match. Earn rewards for watching them, with more animations being unlocked through player participation in Gundam Team Deathmatch, and throughout normal Multiplayer and Battle Royale modes. New Themed Events: Gundam, Independence Day Gundam Events  Gear up with some free rewards as you play Gundam Team Deathmatch! Complete missions and challenges in the Survival of the Fittest event to obtain Gundam themed rewards including new the legendary weapon J358 — Fin Funnel v Gundam, Urban Tracker — Defense Force, Cyro Bomb — Haro (reskin), Emote — Haro Team, new camos, and much more.  Additionally, there are several other events offering free seasonal rewards, including login events and check-ins.  U.S. Independence Day Celebrate the 4th of July with this nearly weeklong event, starting on July 4 and ending on July 9, awarding Independence Day-themed Calling Cards, Charms, Weapon Blueprints, and more for players who login and play Multiplayer and Battle Royale matches throughout the event duration. Season 6 Battle Pass: New Weapon, Signature Attachment The Season 6 Battle Pass features free and premium items including new Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, Calling Cards, and additional Call of Duty® Points to spend on your next Premium Pass or Store purchase. Battle Pass Free Tiers Zero in on distant targets with the bolt-action 3-Line Rifle, a new Marksman Rifle based on a classic World War II design inflicting high damage with high accuracy. Earn other free tier rewards including a variety of Skins, Weapons Blueprints, Vault Coins, and more. Premium Pass Tiers Purchase the Premium Pass for the chance to earn all the content in the Season 6 stream, including tactical warriors like Silver — Chrome Dome Reskin, Misty — Science Pilot, Atlas — Dust Ranger, and The Marshal — Rock Hound. Head into battle with Weapon Blueprints like the BP50 — Pathripper, Oden — Maevwat Technical, PDW-57 — Rocket Re-Entry, BY15 — Dark Moon, and the 3-Line Rifle — Geo Thermal Line, based on the new Season 6 weapon. Battle Pass Subscription: Enlist with the Ground Forces by purchasing a Battle Pass Subscription, granting additional monthly rewards along with a 10% boost to Player and Weapon XP, discount coupons, and limited discounts on 10x crate pulls. The Season 6 Ground Forces will unlock the Gustavo — Cloud Asphalt Operator Skin, Dingo — Desert Moon Weapon Blueprint, and Backpack — Desert Moon. Season 6 Challenge Pass Complete Standard, Special, and Elite Missions to progress through the Season 6 Challenge Pass, earning Tokens that can be used to purchase seasonal items in the Exchange including the new J358 Hammer Grip Signature Attachment, significantly boosting the revolver’s fire rate while restricting the ability to aim down sights. Check the in-game Events tab throughout the season for new Missions and rewards. For more intel on seasonal activities, check the Mission Board located in the main menu. Store Update: Gundam, Double CP Event Gundam Forever Operator Series Draw: Deploy in your favorite Gundam suits with the Gundam Forever Operator Series, including the chance to unlock Operator Skins Proton — v Gundam, Reaper — Sazabi, Ethan — Freedom Gundam, Synaptic — Gundam Deathscythe Hell (EW), and more.  Each Gundam Operator Skin comes with its own Finishing Move plus a unique lobby screen and animation. Gundams can also be displayed in your personal Safe House. Gundam Universe Weapon Series Draw: Gear up for the epic battles ahead with Gundam-themed Weapon Blueprints like the Krig 6 — Sword of the Blue Skies, Locus — Red Comet, Fennec — Axis Miracle, M13 — Glory of Shadows, Beam Scissors – Gundam Deathscythe Hell (EW) and more. Pairing up certain Gundam Operators and Weapon Blueprints will unlock special stylized Operator Skills, while collecting all Gundam Operators and Weapon Blueprints awards special completion rewards!  If you complete both the Weapon Series Draw and Operator Series Draw, you’ll also receive several collection rewards including calling cards, frames, and a Beam Saber — Freedom Gundam.  Double CP Event: Earn double the purchased COD Points (CP) all season long, an awesome opportunity to boost your in-game currency for that next coveted purchase.  Returning Mythic Drops: Keep your eyes open for Mythic store content returning this season, including the Balanced Brilliance Mythic Drop featuring the Mythic QQ9 — Dual Kinetics and the Ion Pulse Mythic Drop featuring the BP-50 — Ion Eruption. Battle Pass Vault: Season 9 — Zombies Are Back (2022) and Season 6 — Templar's Oath (2023) are making their way to the Vault this season. Season 6 — Gundams Arrive launches on Call of Duty: Mobile on July 2nd at 5 PT. See you online. For the latest Call of Duty Mobile news, visit the Call of Duty: Mobile website, as well as Call of Duty: Mobile on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty: Mobile on X, Instagram, and Facebook. For the latest Call of Duty intel, visit Call of Duty, as well as Call of Duty on YouTube. Also follow @Activision on X, Instagram, and Facebook.
html:
Gundams Arrive

Get interstellar and launch into battle as Gundam descends on Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 6 — Gundams Arrive. This major collaboration with the legendary Japanese franchise gives you a chance to engage with and earn Gundam themed operators, weapons, and rewards through many parts of the new season. 

Get ready to duel it out with your own Gundam themed mech in the 4v4 Gundam Team Deathmatch, earn free rewards in the Gundam in-game event, and then unlock Gundam-themed Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, and more through two Series Armories store offers.

Beyond Gundam, the Season 6 Battle Pass adds sci-fi themed Operators, Weapon Blueprints, and more, all ready to stand toe to toe with enemy Operators, whether they’re fighting with boots on the ground or suiting up for mech combat. This exciting content will launch alongside a Double CP event that will last for the entire season.  

Season 6 — Gundams Arrive goes live beginning July 2nd at 5 PM PT.

Multiplayer: Gundam Team Deathmatch

Combat Systems Engaged 

As part of the collaboration with Gundam, we’re excited to announce this epic new limited-time Multiplayer mode where players get to jump into in Call of Duty: Mobile operators themed around Gundams, including icons like Ethan — Freedom Gundam, Reaper — Sazabi Gundam, Proton — v Gundamo, and Deathscythe Gundam (EW). 

This 4v4 mode is based around classic mech vs mech Gundam duels, where the battles are smaller and designed for fluid and versatile combat. Dodge, sprint, and activate your vertical jets to get up high using the suit’s mechanized mobility features. Instead of your normal Loadout weapons, each Gundam comes with its own special abilities and weapons. 

Gundam Team Deathmatch battles are fought from a third-person perspective on a new map made specifically for the mode, taking place on an interstellar space station with multiple futuristic points of interest. Keep an eye out for themed events and easy ways to snag new rewards while playing this mode. 

Bonus Gundam Animations: After completing a game of Gundam Team Deathmatch, players can watch Gundam themed operator animations outside the match. Earn rewards for watching them, with more animations being unlocked through player participation in Gundam Team Deathmatch, and throughout normal Multiplayer and Battle Royale modes.

New Themed Events: Gundam, Independence Day

Gundam Events 

Gear up with some free rewards as you play Gundam Team Deathmatch! Complete missions and challenges in the Survival of the Fittest event to obtain Gundam themed rewards including new the legendary weapon J358 — Fin Funnel v Gundam, Urban Tracker — Defense Force, Cyro Bomb — Haro (reskin), Emote — Haro Team, new camos, and much more. 

Additionally, there are several other events offering free seasonal rewards, including login events and check-ins. 

U.S. Independence Day

Celebrate the 4th of July with this nearly weeklong event, starting on July 4 and ending on July 9, awarding Independence Day-themed Calling Cards, Charms, Weapon Blueprints, and more for players who login and play Multiplayer and Battle Royale matches throughout the event duration.

Season 6 Battle Pass: New Weapon, Signature Attachment

The Season 6 Battle Pass features free and premium items including new Operator Skins, Weapon Blueprints, Calling Cards, and additional Call of Duty® Points to spend on your next Premium Pass or Store purchase.

Battle Pass Free Tiers

Zero in on distant targets with the bolt-action 3-Line Rifle, a new Marksman Rifle based on a classic World War II design inflicting high damage with high accuracy. Earn other free tier rewards including a variety of Skins, Weapons Blueprints, Vault Coins, and more.

Premium Pass Tiers

Purchase the Premium Pass for the chance to earn all the content in the Season 6 stream, including tactical warriors like Silver — Chrome Dome Reskin, Misty — Science Pilot, Atlas — Dust Ranger, and The Marshal — Rock Hound. Head into battle with Weapon Blueprints like the BP50 — Pathripper, Oden — Maevwat Technical, PDW-57 — Rocket Re-Entry, BY15 — Dark Moon, and the 3-Line Rifle — Geo Thermal Line, based on the new Season 6 weapon.

Battle Pass Subscription: Enlist with the Ground Forces by purchasing a Battle Pass Subscription, granting additional monthly rewards along with a 10% boost to Player and Weapon XP, discount coupons, and limited discounts on 10x crate pulls.

The Season 6 Ground Forces will unlock the Gustavo — Cloud Asphalt Operator Skin, Dingo — Desert Moon Weapon Blueprint, and Backpack — Desert Moon.

Season 6 Challenge Pass

Complete Standard, Special, and Elite Missions to progress through the Season 6 Challenge Pass, earning Tokens that can be used to purchase seasonal items in the Exchange including the new J358 Hammer Grip Signature Attachment, significantly boosting the revolver’s fire rate while restricting the ability to aim down sights.

Check the in-game Events tab throughout the season for new Missions and rewards. For more intel on seasonal activities, check the Mission Board located in the main menu.

Store Update: Gundam, Double CP Event

Gundam Forever Operator Series Draw: Deploy in your favorite Gundam suits with the Gundam Forever Operator Series, including the chance to unlock Operator Skins Proton — v Gundam, Reaper — Sazabi, Ethan — Freedom Gundam, Synaptic — Gundam Deathscythe Hell (EW), and more. 

Each Gundam Operator Skin comes with its own Finishing Move plus a unique lobby screen and animation. Gundams can also be displayed in your personal Safe House.

Gundam Universe Weapon Series Draw: Gear up for the epic battles ahead with Gundam-themed Weapon Blueprints like the Krig 6 — Sword of the Blue Skies, Locus — Red Comet, Fennec — Axis Miracle, M13 — Glory of Shadows, Beam Scissors – Gundam Deathscythe Hell (EW) and more.

Pairing up certain Gundam Operators and Weapon Blueprints will unlock special stylized Operator Skills, while collecting all Gundam Operators and Weapon Blueprints awards special completion rewards! 


If you complete both the Weapon Series Draw and Operator Series Draw, you’ll also receive several collection rewards including calling cards, frames, and a Beam Saber — Freedom Gundam. 

Double CP Event: Earn double the purchased COD Points (CP) all season long, an awesome opportunity to boost your in-game currency for that next coveted purchase. 

Returning Mythic Drops: Keep your eyes open for Mythic store content returning this season, including the Balanced Brilliance Mythic Drop featuring the Mythic QQ9 — Dual Kinetics and the Ion Pulse Mythic Drop featuring the BP-50 — Ion Eruption.

Battle Pass Vault: Season 9 — Zombies Are Back (2022) and Season 6 — Templar's Oath (2023) are making their way to the Vault this season.

Season 6 — Gundams Arrive launches on Call of Duty: Mobile on July 2nd at 5 PT.

See you online.

For the latest Call of Duty Mobile news, visit the Call of Duty: Mobile website, as well as Call of Duty: Mobile on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty: Mobile on X, Instagram, and Facebook.

For the latest Call of Duty intel, visit Call of Duty, as well as Call of Duty on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty on X, Instagram and Facebook.
